title: The Adventure Zone: Commitment - Episode 3
description: Our heroes face their first test of combat with their newfound superpowers, with … mixed results. Kardala tells a painful joke. Remy keeps the peace. Nadiya is good out here.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
